title: Build artist platform with jobs, gigs, bookings, store, and Stripe payments

requirements.text: Create artist profile system where artists can register, create profiles with bio, portfolio images, skills, and contact information
acceptanceCriteria: Artists can create and edit their profiles
Profiles display bio, portfolio images, skills, and contact information
Profiles are publicly viewable

requirements.text: Implement job offerings marketplace where employers can post job opportunities for artists with job title, description, budget, and deadline
acceptanceCriteria: Employers can create job postings with title, description, budget, and deadline
Artists can browse and view all job postings
Job postings display all relevant details

requirements.text: Create gigs marketplace where artists can list their services (gigs) with title, description, pricing, and delivery time, and clients can browse and purchase gigs
acceptanceCriteria: Artists can create gig listings with title, description, pricing, and delivery time
Clients can browse available gigs
Clients can view detailed gig information

requirements.text: Build booking system where clients can book artist services by selecting date, time, service type, and duration, with availability calendar for artists
acceptanceCriteria: Artists can set their availability in a calendar interface
Clients can select available dates and times to book services
Bookings include service type and duration
Artists receive booking notifications

requirements.text: Create product store where artists can list physical or digital products (artwork, prints, merchandise) with images, descriptions, and prices, and customers can browse and add items to cart
acceptanceCriteria: Artists can create product listings with images, descriptions, and prices
Customers can browse all available products
Customers can add products to a shopping cart
Product images are displayed clearly

requirements.text: Integrate Stripe payment processing to handle card payments for gig purchases, bookings, and product store orders
acceptanceCriteria: Stripe payment form accepts credit and debit cards
Payments process successfully for gigs, bookings, and products
Payment confirmation is displayed to users after successful transactions
Failed payments show appropriate error messages

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual identity with warm, creative aesthetics using earth tones and artistic typography that appeals to artists and creative professionals, applying this style consistently across all pages and components
acceptanceCriteria: All pages follow a consistent color palette with warm, earthy tones
Typography choices reflect creative and artistic sensibility
Layout and spacing create an inviting, gallery-like atmosphere
Visual style is coherent across profile pages, marketplace, bookings, and store

requirements.text: Display generated hero banner, artist profile placeholder images, and product showcase images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Hero banner image displays on the main landing page
Artist profile placeholders are used for profiles without custom images
Product showcase images are rendered in the store section
All generated images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend logic in a single actor architecture
Must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for frontend
Stripe integration must be implemented according to Internet Computer capabilities
All data persistence must use Motoko stable storage
nonGoals: Social media integrations beyond basic sharing
Real-time chat or messaging between artists and clients
Third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity
